about_the_game:
By pass the enhanced version of XENRO to use the Titan module anytime, anywhere. No longer limited by space, no longer limited by quests. Whether it is in the story mode or in the main world, the Titan module will always be available for you!

This DLC currently include:
- Titan Turret
- Titan Shield
- Titan Aid
- Main World Random Skill Access
- Baked Pork Cake Auto Healing

Titan Turret Modules:


Activate the skill to summon 3 reinforcements with Titan shields. Reinforcement can last for 25 seconds, each shield has more than 1000 health, this module has a 120 seconds cooldown

Titan Shield Module:


Activate the skill to summon a Titan shield right in front of the character. The shield has more than 1000 health, the shield can last for 20 seconds, this module has a 60 seconds cooldown

Titan Aid Module:


Activate the skill to restore 20% health of MAX health. This module has a 120 seconds cooldown

Baked Pork Cake Auto Healing Module:


Passive skill that regenerates health every second up to 60% of maximum health

More Titan modules will be added gradually as the story progresses! Note: 2000 initial players can be activated Titan Modules for free in the main world, but not in the story world.
